doc.title: Zento Contemporary Japanese Restaurant: Want to take on Iron Chef Morimoto?
doc.text: If/IN you/PRP are/VBP a/DT fan/NN of/IN the/DT Iron/JJ Chef/NN series/NN ,/, then/RB the/DT mention/VB of/IN Iron/NN Chef/NN Masaharu/NN Morimoto/NN might/VB conjure/VB up/IN images/NN of/IN fantastic/JJ Japanese/NN creations/NNS which/WRB his/PRP$ critics/NN would/MD say/VB is/VBZ not/RB Japanese/JJ at/IN all/NN ./. This/DT is/VBZ the/DT paradox/NN ./.
